unnormalised: Okay, koni tori oncologyntlem noveench kitem asa mhunnon vicharlem, bara? Tem khuub vishal kshetra asa, punn maka khobor asa tem sangta, chodd korun mhoji Nani Tata Memorialant treatment ghetonastana tankam modot korun.
normalised: Borem, konnem-i oncology-antlea navinatem babtint vicharlem, barabor? Tem ek vistrut kshetr asa, punn maka khobor asa tem hanv tuka sangtam, chodd korun Tata Memorial-ant hanvem mhoji Nani hiche upcharank modot korun ghetelelem anubhavacher adharit asa.

unnormalised: Poilem mhunntlear, immunotherapy khup mhotvachi asa. Doctorsankh kiteak cancersant khup borem result dista. Nani-che oncologists, Dr. Sharma ani Dr. Iyer, tankam CAR-T cell therapy-cher chodd uloitalem. Tem sci-fi sarkhem aikunk yeta, punn dishta tem प्रमाण, tem kiteak blood cancersank kaam korta. Ani targeted therapiesankh chodd precise zatat. ते खऱ्यांनी cancer cellsant विशिष्ट mutationsंक target करुंक शकता. Cancerak heat-seeking missile sarkhem think kar. Nani ek tashi therapy-cher asli ani tenen tankam khup modot keli.
normalised: Poilem mhunje, immunotherapy azun legit ek vhodd vishoy asa. Doktorankh kaim cancers kodden chomotkarik porinnam distat. Nani-chi oncologists, Doctor Sharma ani Doctor Iyer, tankam C-A-R-T cell therapy vixim chodd uloitatat. Tem sci-fi bhaxen aikota, punn disata tem kaim rogtachea cancers khatir khorench kam karta. Tachch pori, targeted therapies chodd barik zaunk lagleat. Tankam cancer cells-antle khas badalankh niyantron korunk zata. Tem cancer khatir ek ushnta sodunk vochonchem missile bhaxen vichar. Nani ekach therapy-cher asli ani tannem tinka khub modot keli.

unnormalised: Ani मग early detection vishayant, regularly screening korunk जाय, तें खूब म्हात्वाचे. Mammograms, pap smears, colonoscopies, हे सगळें खूब गरजेचें. Cancer zata mhunn लवकर कळ्ळ्यार survival rates खूब्ब वाडटा. Mhoje Chacha-cho ixtt stage 1 lung cancer zaun disllo karann tankam ₹2000 diun checkup korunk nirdhar ghethalo. Tankam treatment chalu karunk laggli ani atam te healthy assat.
normalised: Magir ek poilem sodun kaddpachem vishay asa. Niyamit rupan screening korun gheunchem khub gorjechem. Mammograms, pap smears, colonoscopies, soglle prakar. Cancer laginch sodun kaddun gheitlear jivnt ravpachea dharani khub forok poddta. Mhoje chacha-chea ixtak pahilea sthora lung cancer diagnose zalo kiteak tannem don hazar rupiak check up korun gheuncheach nirnnoy ghetlo. Tannem upcharache date adim ghetli ani to atam niramoy jiyet asa.

unnormalised: Ani aakhrek, supportive care visor naka! Cancer asop khup avgodd, fukt physical নয়, punn mentally khup avgodd asa. Nanik hospitalantlem support groupsan khup modot keli. Tankam yoga ani meditation sessions aslli. Tem ek vhodd चित्रपट, tumi jannata? Aasha karta hanen tumkam modot keli!
normalised: Ani nimanne, supportive care visronakai! Cancer kodden deal korop kastt, fakt shiririkuch nhoi punn mentalluy asa. Nani-k hospital-antlea support groups-anchi khub modot zali. Tankam yoga ani meditation sessions legit asle. Tem sogllem vhoddlem chitrantlem ek bhag asa, tuka khobor asa? Ashaa karta hem tuka modot kortolem!
